Name: Коты Воители
About the game: Cats Warriors is a strategy game made in 2D hand-drawn graphics. If you are reading this, then you are half a step away from an experimental mixture of the genres of Survival, Strategy, Tower Defense with cute cats. Everything is very simple. Collect fruits, go into the house, buy cats for resources, feed them what you have to, give them weapons in their paws and send them to defend the territory from evil monster cats. Remember that you only have a couple of minutes to collect your army before the enemies arrive, so hurry up. Also, do not forget to place weapons on the map and pump them in the menu. Good luck in the cat battle!
